import { TextField, MenuItem, InputAdornment, Button} from '@material-ui/core' import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid' import {useState} from 'react' export default function MeetFirstStep({ handleNext, handleChange, values:{motivo, profesional}, filedError, isError}){ const [prof, setProf] = useState('') const tipoConsultas=[ "Vacuna", "Control", "Pelea con otra rata", "Depresion", "Celos" ] const changeConsulta = (event) =>{ const consulta = event.target.value setDisable(false) if(consulta === "Vacuna"){ setProf(["Ivana","Gate Evite"]) } else{ setProf(["German", "Esi"]) } handleChange("motivo")(event) } const isEmpty = false return( <> {tipoConsultas.map((tipo) => ( {tipo} ))} {prof!='' && prof.map((tipo) => ( {tipo} ))}
) }
